Articles.Text: 13% of participants continued to shed SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the feces at 4 months after diagnosis & 4% shed at 7 months. GI symptoms are associated with fecal shedding of RNA.

The neurons and other neural cells that SARS-CoV-2 is infecting, are shedding Spike and Nucleocapsid and levels are significantly higher in long COVID and even higher in long COVID with neuropsychiatric symptoms.
